entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as a threat to Harry and his cousin in Little Whinging. They are described as creatures that Muggles cannot see.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the one who smirks at Harry's story and suggests that dementors would make a good cover story.

entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones expresses surprise at the mention of dementors in Little Whinging.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who claims to have seen two dementors and is accused by Fudge of lying.

entities.name: little whinging
entities.description: Little Whinging is mentioned as a location where dementors are supposedly present.

entities.name: wizengamot
entities.description: The Wizengamot is the court that Harry and Fudge are speaking to.
